results.title: Simvastatin Impairs the Inflammatory and Repair Phases of the Postinjury Skeletal Muscle Regeneration
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ appeared to reduce M1 macrophage activity, resulting in slower removal of @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_hereditary_spherocytic_hemolytic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536356 @@@necrotic debris@@@ and sustained @DISEASE_Necrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@.
